text: Jeannot Szwarc (21 November 1939 â€“ 15 January 2025) was a French-born American director. He was known for his work in American movies and television. He directed the movies Jaws 2, Somewhere in Time, Supergirl and Santa Claus: The Movie.Jeannot Szwarc, Yahoo! TV. Szwarc died from respiratory failure a hospital in Loches, France, on 14 January 2025, at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American television directors Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Deaths from respiratory failure
title: Jeannot Szwarc
